modName: zzjay and Grace Darklings Hoods with hairs
summary: A set of hoods with hairs
descriptionHtml:
[font=Palatino Linotype][center][size=3]
[color=#90ee90]Description[/color][/size][/center][center]----------------[/center]

This mod adds adds 10 different hair colours of Grace Darkling's Ranger Hood,in 8 hood colours.
And 6 different hair colour for 6 different hood textures.
Female only.

Only the RANGER HOODS are upgradable.
the category is leather and requires the same perks as vanilla leather.
All the others are in achest either in QASMOKE or in DRAGONSREACH.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49877/?]CRAFTABLE armored and not armored version is HERE!!![/url]

LOCATION - Dragonsreach

[center][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/28147-1-1363618100.jpg[/img][/center]

[color=lightgreen]FOR EACH HOOD TEXTURE ALL THE DIFFERENT HAIR COLOURS ARE AVAILABLE,for a total of 116 hoods[/color]

Type coc qasmoke to get there and then coc riverwood to get out

New Textures Available -
For The Ranger Draped Hood;
Blue Snowflake
Dirty Blue Snowflake
Imperial
Dark Brotherhood
Brown Leather Leaf Embossed
Northborn wite and brown fur hoods
Plain Black >> ONLY AS A REPLACER
Plain Grey >> ONLY AS A REPLACER

Before asking any questions check the FAQ!

[center][color=lightgreen][size=3]VIDEOS[/size][/color][/center][center]----------------[/center]

[youtube]gUv3I-LwVHw[/youtube]

[center][color=lightgreen][size=3]INSTALLATION[/size][/color][/center][center]----------------[/center]

[url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/10168-1-1341317929.jpg]How to install mods by apachii[/url]

[center][color=lightgreen][size=3]FAQ[/size][/color][/center][center]----------------[/center]

Q-
Will this hood work with any hairstyle i'm using?

A-
No,the hair mesh is added to the hoodmesh...and bascaly it's a wig.

Q-
Can you make this or this...?

A-
No,I work for myself...I don't take requests,...
Anyway you can share your ideas on what would be cool..and maybe i'll have time for it.

Q-
This doesn't work...what should i do?

A-
REQUIRES Skyrim Version 1.8 or Above!

[center][color=lightgreen][size=3]Mods Used[/size][/color][/center][center]----------------[/center]

For the Breton:
Vanilla meshes
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36249/?]Skin texture[/url]
unp body
-you can get the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21467]follower[/url] here:


The Woodelf:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24273]Ethereal Elven Overhaul[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27783]HN66 Long Lashes [/url]

Jewellry - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24549/?]Severus Jewellry Collection[/url]

Armors:

- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7184]GraceDarkling's ranger armor[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20077/?]Tribunal Robes by Zairaam[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25832/?]Crimson Ranger Armor[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19733//?]Immersive Armors[/url]

Enbs:
I use Bleak enb by trustinall:

[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24828][img]http://i.imgur.com/OJOuV.jpg[/img][/url][/center]


Grace Darkling uses :
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20781]Project Enb by bronze316 with CoT[/url]
CoT:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802]Climates of Tamriel[/url]

[center][color=lightgreen][size=3]Troubleshooting[/size][/color][/center][center]----------------[/center]

1-the hair may change colour a bit near indoors fires

2-Occasional clipping hoodhairs on some poses...and occasional clipping hoodarmor.
The hood was part of ths mod...so you may want to try it.

[center][color=lightgreen][size=3]Changelog[/size][/color][/center][center]----------------[/center]
[size=1]
-V1-release
-V2:-added new colours and a new variant (farmer hood)
-added karliah and serana mesh replacer hoods
-V3 - new alphas and double hairmesh for the hoods for a softer look as the original hairstyle
[/size]

[center][color=lightgreen][size=3]LicenseLegal[/size][/color][/center][center]----------------[/center]

As all the stuff doesn't belong to me...please before doing anything contace me and Grace
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/69377

ANY KIND OF ESP TWEAK,AS LONG AS IT WON'T INCLUDE MESHES OR TEXTURES IS AUTHORIZED!!!

DO NOT MAKE MONEY!

[center][color=lightgreen][size=3]Credits[/size][/color][/center][center]----------------[/center]

Apachii for the hair
DreamBurrow for the RegalAssassin Hood texture
Gambit77
Xenius
Northborn
Bethesda for skyrim
-------------------------------------------------------------------[/font]
